import React, { Component } from 'react'; import SuperSelectField from 'material-ui-superselectfield'; import Toggle from 'material-ui/Toggle'; {/*import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton' import Visibility from '@material-ui/icons/Visibility' import VisibilityOff from '@material-ui/icons/VisibilityOff' npm install -s @material-ui/icons */} const containerStyle = { padding: 40, paddingBottom: 0, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', height: 'calc(100% - 40px)', }; const displayState = (state) => (state && state.value ? state.label || state.value : 'empty state'); class CodeExample extends Component { state = { state11: null, state12: { value: 'E', label: 'label E' }, floatingLabelState: null, }; handleSelection = (values, name) => this.setState({ [name]: values }); handleDisable = (event, isDisabled) => this.setState({ isDisabled }); handlePlaceholder = (event, withPlaceholder) => this.setState({ withPlaceholder }); render () { const { state11, state12, floatingLabelState, isDisabled, withPlaceholder } = this.state; // eslint-disable-next-line no-console console.debug('state11', state11, '\nstate12', state12, '\nfloatingLabelState', floatingLabelState); return (

State 12: {displayState(state12)}
State floatingLabel: {displayState(floatingLabelState)}

); } } export default CodeExample;
